title: Apple Daily to Suspend Paper If Hong Kong Accounts Stay Frozen
content:
1. Apple Daily to Suspend Paper If Hong Kong Accounts Stay Frozen  Bloomberg
  2. Hong Kong journalist says newsroom raid 'sent shudders through the industry'  CNN
  3. Apple Daily: HK pro-democracy paper says it will decide closure by Friday  BBC News
  4. We must stand with Hong Kong’s embattled journalists  The Independent
  5. Hong Kong's Apple Daily Runs Low on Funds to Print Paper  Bloomberg Politics
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

Hong Kong journalist says newsroom raid 'sent shudders through the industry'  CNN

We must stand with Hong Kong’s embattled journalists  The Independent
Hong Kong's Apple Daily Runs Low on Funds to Print Paper  Bloomberg Politics

localize.title: 香港のアカウントが凍結されたままの場合、Apple Dailyは紙面を一時停止する
如果香港账户继续被冻结，《苹果日报》将暂停发稿
如果香港賬戶繼續被凍結，《蘋果日報》將暫停發稿
